title: Book Round-Trip Flight with Rental Car
description: A traveler needs to book a round-trip flight and a rental car for a 5-day trip to Denver.

tasks.description: Search for round-trip flights to Denver (DEN) for the specified dates.
Search for available rental cars at Denver airport for the same dates.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds suitable rental car options.

tasks.description: Create a single booking containing both the selected flights and rental car.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully creates a bundled booking and provides a single confirmation number.
